amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for Salaries and Expenses, General Administration in the Department of Justice by $1 million and increases funding for Violence Against Women Prevention and Prosecution Programs (college campuses) by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Salaries and Expenses, General Administration in the Department of Justice by $1 million and to increase funding for Violence Against Women Prevention and Prosecution Programs (College Campuses) by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sinema amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sinema amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Ms. Sinema.
